channel.title: Static Routes - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: 1.0 Network Fundamentals 1.6 Configure and verify IPv4 addressing and subnetting 3.0 IP Connectivity 3.1 Interpret the components of routing table 3.1.a Routing protocol code 3.1.b Prefix 3.1.c Network mask 3.1.d Next hop 3.1.e Administrative distance 3.1.f Metric 3.1.g Gateway of last resort 3.2 Determine how a router makes a forwarding decision by default 3.2.a Longest match 3.2.b Administrative distance 3.3 Configure and verify IPv4 and IPv6 static routing 3.3.a Default route
